targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM $table

WHERE
    $timeFilter
    and sec_code = '$sec_code'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 604800) * 604800) * 1000 as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM default.candles

WHERE
    date >= toDateTime(1520176154) AND date <= toDateTime(1636038554)
    and sec_code = 'MAGN'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('CAPEX','Net cash (used in)/from investing activities - continuing operations'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('EBITDA','Gross profit'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('Revenue','Revenue - third parties'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from $table
where sec_code == '$sec_code'
group by quarter_name, $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('CAPEX','Net cash (used in)/from investing activities - continuing operations'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('EBITDA','Gross profit'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('Revenue','Revenue - third parties'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from default.financial_highlights
where sec_code == 'CHMF'
group by quarter_name, quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit before financing and taxation'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from $table
group by quarter_name,$dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit before financing and taxation'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from default.financial_highlights
group by quarter_name,quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Revenue
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Revenue
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Cost
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit from operations'), -value, value)) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties', 'Profit from operations'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Cost
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit from operations'), -value, value)) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties', 'Profit from operations'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Amortisation

    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Depreciation and amortisation'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
   q,
   value-neighbor(value, -1) as "NWC change",
   value as NWC
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(value) as value
    FROM $table WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and indicator == 'Net cash from operating activities' 
    GROUP BY q, indicator ORDER BY q)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
   q,
   value-neighbor(value, -1) as "NWC change",
   value as NWC
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as value
    FROM default.financial_highlights WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and indicator == 'Net cash from operating activities' 
    GROUP BY q, indicator ORDER BY q)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    trim(TRAILING '*' from product) as product,
    last_value(sales.value)*last_value(prices.price) as perc
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
       LEFT JOIN prices_for_products as prices ON
          sales.quarter == prices.quarter
      and sales.sec_code == prices.sec_code
      and trim(TRAILING '*' from prices.product) == trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)
WHERE sales.sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Semi-finished products',
     'Hot-rolled coil',
     'Hot-rolled plate',
     'Hot - rolled coil and plate',
     'Cold-rolled coil',
     'Colour coated coil',
     'Long products',
     'Metalware products',
     'Large diameter pipes',
     'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)) == 1
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    trim(TRAILING '*' from product) as product,
    last_value(sales.value)*last_value(prices.price) as perc
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
       LEFT JOIN prices_for_products as prices ON
          sales.quarter == prices.quarter
      and sales.sec_code == prices.sec_code
      and trim(TRAILING '*' from prices.product) == trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)
WHERE sales.sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Semi-finished products',
     'Hot-rolled coil',
     'Hot-rolled plate',
     'Hot - rolled coil and plate',
     'Cold-rolled coil',
     'Colour coated coil',
     'Long products',
     'Metalware products',
     'Large diameter pipes',
     'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)) == 1
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    structure,
    avg(value)
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Iron ore pellets and concentrate',
     'Coking and Steam coal',
     'Transport and storage services'
), structure) == 1
GROUP BY q, structure 
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    structure,
    avg(value)
FROM default.revenue_structure
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Iron ore pellets and concentrate',
     'Coking and Steam coal',
     'Transport and storage services'
), structure) == 1
GROUP BY q, structure 
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Rolled products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM $table

    WHERE
        sec_code == '$sec_code'
        and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q

ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Rolled products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM default.revenue_structure

    WHERE
        sec_code == 'CHMF'
        and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q

ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

FROM
(

        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM $table

    WHERE
        sec_code == '$sec_code'
        and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q

ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    product,
    last_value(value) as ton
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array(
'Coal',
'Iron ore',
'Rolled products',
'Downstream products'), product) == 1
GROUP BY q, product 
ORDER BY q, product
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    product,
    last_value(value) as ton
FROM default.consolidated_sales_for_products
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array(
'Coal',
'Iron ore',
'Rolled products',
'Downstream products'), product) == 1
GROUP BY q, product 
ORDER BY q, product

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(rolled, 0), coil, rolled)) as "Hot-Rolled price"
    FROM (
      SELECT $dateCol as q,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot - rolled coil and plate', product), price, 0)) as rolled,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled coil', product), price, 0)) as coil,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled plate', product), price, 0)) as plate
      FROM $table
      WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and product LIKE 'Hot%' GROUP BY q)
GROUP BY q    
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage))
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(rolled, 0), coil, rolled)) as "Hot-Rolled price"
    FROM (
      SELECT quarter as q,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot - rolled coil and plate', product), price, 0)) as rolled,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled coil', product), price, 0)) as coil,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled plate', product), price, 0)) as plate
      FROM default.prices_for_products
      WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and product LIKE 'Hot%' GROUP BY q)
GROUP BY q    
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 825))
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Rolled price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Rolled products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage - 36)
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Rolled price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Rolled products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 825 - 36)
)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, $price_lag_months, date))) as q,
    avg(close) as HRC_FOB_CHINA
FROM $table
WHERE code == 'MHCc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, date))) as q,
    avg(close) as HRC_FOB_CHINA
FROM default.stock_prices
WHERE code == 'MHCc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Downstream price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Downstream products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage + 198)
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Downstream price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Downstream products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 825 + 198)
)
ORDER BY q

from $table

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Iron ore price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and structure == 'Iron ore pellets and concentrate'
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Iron ore'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q ,  218)
)
ORDER BY q

  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Iron ore price"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and structure == 'Iron ore pellets and concentrate'
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Iron ore'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q ,  218)
)

from $table

GROUP BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(price) as Index62Fe
FROM $table
WHERE product == 'Fe'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(price) as Index62Fe
FROM default.fob_prices
WHERE product == 'Fe'
GROUP BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_IronSlab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 244)

panels.title: Корреляция индекса ЖРС и железной части кеш-кост сляба

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

GROUP BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(price) as ConsolidateFlatHotRolled
FROM $table
WHERE product == 'Flat hot-rolled products'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(price) as ConsolidateFlatHotRolled
FROM default.consolidated_prices_for_products
WHERE product == 'Flat hot-rolled products'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, $price_lag_months, date))) as q,
    avg(close)/8 as SHHCc1
from $table
WHERE code == 'SHHCc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, date))) as q,
    avg(close)/8 as SHHCc1
from default.stock_prices
WHERE code == 'SHHCc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_IronSlab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 244)

panels.title: Корреляция индекса ЖРС и железной части кеш-кост сляба

list.definition:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
list.name: forecast_Slab
list.query:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
